description:
Taikoubou and his friends take a break to recover their wounds from their battle with the Shisei. They later catch up with Ki Shou, Kou Hiko, and Ki Hatsu, who are still trying to persuade Su Kokuko and the North to join Seiki`s forces.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La viole de Chi Chan émeut l’ennemi
The Melody of the Chinese Fiddle Drifts to Su Castle
弦, 崇城に流るる事
